titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: DISTANCE FROM DENTATE LINE - Description

div.p: DISTANCE FROM DENTATE LINE is the distance of the Tumour from the dentate line for Abdomino-Perineal Excision of Rectum (APER) specimens, where the UCUM UNIT OF MEASUREMENT is 'Millimetres (mm)' during a Colorectal Cancer Care Spell.
